Question.Subject: URGENT anyone know if "PC TV and Hifi" website is real or not?
Question.Content: i want to buy something from this website but am worried about the site has anyone purchased anything from this website
Question.ChosenAnswer:
I doubt it, it looks super shady. the registrant has kep there contact details well off it, you can only contact them by email...
Domain name: pctvhifi.co.uk
Registrant: isss
Registrant type: Unknown
Registrant's address: 20 Lilac avenue Stocksbridge Sheffield yorkshire S36 1DD United Kingdom
This is a house with a large conservatory, doesn't look like electrical retail unit..
G0 to google maps and put this in: Sheffield S36 1DD
